content: it became a free-form exercise in glove making but people are welcome to ask about it after much picture-taking writing and hair-pulling i worked out most of the kinks of the pattern dragonscale fluffy gauntlets 1 i have adjusted the gauge/yarn/hook to reflect the new look if there are any questions please feel free to message me this is my first pattern so i am afraid i may have overlooked something people have asked about a text-only/printer-friendly copy of the pattern here it is text only instructions 2 1 http //thanesprayers tumblr com/post/82830456815/i-worked-pretty-hard-to-figure-out-how-to-make 2 http //thanesprayers tumblr com/post/99128273049/text-only-instructions-for-dragonscale-gauntlets
